snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, trying to increase support from Republicans, has recruited Susan Del Percio, who advised Joseph J. Lhota during his bid for mayor of New York City.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, trying to increase support from Republicans, recruits Susan Del Percio, who advised Republican Joseph J Lhota during his bid for mayor of New York City; hiring of Del Percio also sidelines her from possibly working for Westchester County Executive Rob Astorino, Cuomo's likeliest Republican gubernatorial opponent.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, trying to increase support from Republicans, has recruited Susan Del Percio, who advised Joseph J. Lhota during his bid for mayor of New York City.

headline.main: Cuomo Hires G.O.P. Adviser as Aides Shift to Re-election Campaign
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Hires G.O.P. Adviser as Aides Shift to Campaign
